name: Giana Sisters: Rise of the Owlverlord
name_original: Giana Sisters: Rise of the Owlverlord
description:
Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord is a blistering platformer with morphing worlds, featuring seven brand new levels, a new boss and new gripping tracks from Chris Hülsbeck and Machinae Supremacy!

Dash through tricky levels and transform the whole world at will in this fast-paced platformer. Rise of the Owlverlord combines graphics that pack a visual punch and tight controls with the challenge of retro era platforming. Fluidly morph between two dynamically different dream worlds to solve puzzles and combat grueling enemies and bosses. You’ll have to intertwine perky Giana's twirling jump with punky Giana's hammering dash attack to survive her dual nightmare.Change Giana's personality to unlock her unique abilities - you'll need to control both sides to survive her dreams! As Giana changes, so does the world around her. Giana’s dreamworlds leap off the screen with gorgeous 3D graphics that morph before your eyes. 7 rich levels across several distinct worlds, each transforming into the two contrasting dreamworlds. Collecting gems and finding secret locations requires strategy and interchanging the two worlds. The remixed mode is a lot easier to survive than its standard mode. The “easy” difficulty for Giana should roughly correspond to the “normal” difficulty for casual platformer games. Hardcore and Über Hardcore modes also await players who are full masters of the game and quite possibly insane.
